body.p:
To his Excellency Thomas E. Bramlette
Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
Sir I hereby tender to you this my resignation of the Office of Justice of the peace for Hopkins County Kentucky in District No 2 and request you to accept the Same --

I would suggest the name of John N. Taliaferro of said District as a suitable one for successor for several reasons -- he lives at the seat of Justice for said County & there is no other Justice within easy reach of it -- which is a cause of serious delay & inconvenience frequently. Given under my hand at Madisonville Ky this 31st day of March 1865

I concur in the above recommendation
Dick Littlepage Deputy
Clerk Hopkins County Court

Hopkins Co
Justice Peace
Resignation & Appointment
6th Apl/65
